page.title: 09TICKHILL INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: {Computers}used to be as big as rooms, infact they were rooms with components all over the wall.Now thanks to the micro chip, computers have become smaller and smaller.For instance the Spectrum is a very small computer it is about 30 cm long and that holds more memory than one of those rooms. Some computers hold 1 megobite which is 1000k and that computer is as big as a Spectrum.Most people in Tickhill use the Spectrum for games because that computer has an easy language to learn and its easy to make games for.It is the most popular machine available.That is why it has the biggest range of games in the world. They use the BBC for programming just as much as games.It has very high resolution{graphics}so it can{design}things well and so it needs a special monitor.
